TopicTitle: Performace is so good that you can make game VR now.

Articles.Content: I am agreeing with title,  i want VR too. I have no latest pc and gpu but framerates seems to be enought to enjoy VR. Click that VR button at unity editor please.
VR requires minimum 90fps for non-headache experience (which it needs to render twice, for each eye). I don't think the game is there yet, or that it'll ever be.
